meanings.definition: The front side of a store facing the street.
meanings.sent1: The storefronts of the shops were decorated with colorful signs.
meanings.sent2: People passing by the storefronts could see the products displayed inside.
meanings.sent3: The storefronts looked like friendly faces welcoming customers in.
meanings.sent4: The storefronts stood like guardians protecting the treasures within.
meanings.sent5: The storefronts gleamed in the sunlight, drawing in curious shoppers.

meanings.definition: A business establishment with a physical location for selling goods or services.
meanings.sent1: The new storefronts in town attracted a lot of attention.
meanings.sent2: Customers crowded the storefronts during the holiday sale.
meanings.sent3: The storefronts seemed to gossip about the latest trends in town.
meanings.sent4: The storefronts were like beacons of commerce in the bustling city.
meanings.sent5: The storefronts buzzed with activity as customers browsed the merchandise.
